alert.note: Alert for Cavalier; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 11:15AM CDT until May 15 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Valley City affecting Barnes County. Maple River near Enderlin affecting Ransom and Cass Counties. Pembina River at Walhalla affecting Pembina and Cavalier Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Sheyenne River Diversion at West Fargo affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River at Harwood affecting Cass County. Sheyenne River at Lisbon affecting Ransom County. Sheyenne River near Kindred affecting Richland and Cass Counties. Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Walhalla. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 11.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 11.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
